name: Swipetown! City Builder Puzzle
description:
Swipe to combine tiles and build the ultimate 2048 city!

Are you a master of endless 2048?! Do you think you’re ready to conquer the ultimate tile challenge? 2048 is better than ever before in SWIPETOWN! Swipe to combine structures and build the biggest and best town possible. When the board fills up, you’re done! Play this addictive 2048 game over and over again to beat your high score!

HOW TO PLAY: Swipe to move all tiles. When two identical tiles combine, they merge into one. When the board fills up, it’s game over.

--- SWIPETOWN SPECIAL FEATURES ---
- Combine types of plants and buildings to build your city
- Play a classic endless 2048 game with numbers
- Classic and Free 2048 Game
- Build a City and see how far you can upgrade the buildings each round
- How advanced of a civilization can you create in one round!?
- Addictive and challenging game play
